ีีฅึีกีฏีกีถ ีฅึีฏึีธึีด ีญีซีฝีฟ ีฃึีกึีถีถีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฅีถีฉีกึีฏีพีธีฒ ีซึีกีถึีซ ีผีฅีชีซีฝีธึีถีฅึีจ ีฝีธีพีธึีฅีฌ ีฅีถ ีญีธึีกีดีกีถีฏีธึีฅีถ ีทึีปีกีถึีฅีฌ ีฃึีกึีถีถีธึีฉีตีกีถ ึ ึีฅีถึีถีฅึีจึ ินีฅึ ีซึีฅีถึ ีฅึีฏึีธึีด ีทีกีฟีฅึีซ ึีซีฌีดีฅึีจ ีดีฅีฎ ีงีฏึีกีถ ีนีฅีถ ีขีกึีฑึีกีถีธึีด, ีฝีกีฏีกีตีถ ีฅึีซีฟีกีฝีกึีค ีฝีฅึีธึีถีคีจ ีถีกีตีธึีด ีง ีคึีกีถึ ีดีกีฝีถีกีพีธึ ึีธึึีกีคึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซ ีชีกีดีกีถีกีฏี ีฃีกีฒีฟีถีซึ

entry.title: War, Peace, and the Trump Road

media:group.media:title: War, Peace, and the Trump Road
media:group.media:description:
In this episode of the CivilNet podcast, political commentator Eric Hacopian unpacks key developments shaping Armeniaโs regional and domestic landscape. He analyzes the latest Pashinyan-Aliyev meeting in Abu Dhabi and the growing U.S. interest in the future of the Syunik corridor. Hacopian also weighs in on the implications of a political crackdown in Armenia on government critics such as Samvel Karapetyan, and whether European Union membership could be on the horizon.
0:00- Abu Dhabi Pashinyan-Aliyev summit 1:25- U.S. interest in Syunik corridor 7:13- What does the corridor plan mean for Armenia? 8:05- Is the fallout in Azerbaijani-Russian relations for real? 11:21- Is the Armenian government acting anti-democratic? 13:18- Western silence on opposition crackdown 14:42- Standing up to anti-democratic actions 16:62- Nationalization of electric company 19:32- Kaja Kallasโ visit to Armenia & EU relations 25:01- Armenia-Turkey relations

media:group.media:title: ีีฅีถึ ีนีฅีถึ ีขีกึีซีฏีกีคีกีพีธึีพีฅีฌ, ีทีกึีชีพีฅีฌีธึ ีฅีถึ ึ ึีฅีถึีธีพ. ีิที-ีซ ีฟีถึ ึีฅีถีซ ีบีกีทีฟีธีถีกีฏีกีฟีกึ
media:group.media:description:
ิปีีถีน ีง ีฝีบีกีฝีพีธึีด ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีซ ีงีฌีฅีฏีฟึีกีฏีกีถ ึีกีถึีฅึีซีถ. ีจีถีฏีฅึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฃีฌีญีกีพีธึ ีฟีถึ ึีฅีถีซ ีบีกีทีฟีธีถีกีฏีกีฟีกึ ิดีกีพีซีฉ ีีกีฆีซีถีตีกีถีจ ยซีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉ ิฒีซีฆีถีฅีฝีซยป ีฅีฉีฅึีธึีด ีญีธีฝีธึีด ีง ีิที-ีซ ีถีฅึีฏีก ีพีซีณีกีฏีซ, ีฐีธีฝีกีถึีกีฆึีฏีธึีดีถีฅึีซ ีญีถีคึีซ, ีดีกึีฆีฅึีซ ีฅีถีฉีกีฏีกีผีธึึีพีกีฎึีถีฅึีซ ึ ีฏีกีผีธึีตึีซ ีฐีถีกึีกีพีธึ ีบีฅีฟีกีฏีกีถีกึีดีกีถ ีดีกีฝีซีถึ ีีก ีกึีฑีกีฃีกีถึีธึีด ีง ีพีกึีนีกีบีฅีฟ ีีซีฏีธีฌ ีีกีทีซีถีตีกีถีซ ีฐีกีตีฟีกึีกึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซีถ, ีญีธีฝีธึีด ีฏีกีผีกีพีกึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีคีฅีด ีถีกีญีกีฟีฅีฝีพีธีฒ ีซึีกีพีกีฏีกีถ ึีกีตีฌีฅึีซ ีดีกีฝีซีถี ีทีฅีทีฟีฅีฌีธีพ, ีธึ ีจีถีฏีฅึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฐีกีดีกึ ีบีฅีฟีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถ ีธึ ีฃีธึีฎีธีฒ ีซีทีญีกีถีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีฐีฝีฟีกีฏ ีฟีกึีกีถีปีกีฟีพีกีฎ ีฅีถึ

entry.title: Pashinyan rules out foreign control over Syunik transit route

media:group.media:title: Pashinyan rules out foreign control over Syunik transit route
media:group.media:description:
๐Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan reaffirms that Armenia will retain full sovereignty over any Syunik transit route, though management could be outsourced. ๐Armenia is more likely to leave the CSTO than to restore its suspended membership, according to Pashinyan, citing the blocโs failure to defend Armenian sovereignty. ๐Armenia plans to assume control of its electricity grid through new management while its current owner, Samvel Karapetyan, faces fresh criminal charges his team calls politically motivated.
